description:
During live-migration port-update is send to neutron after plug_vifs is executed. In a setup with neutron ml2 plugin where two nodes require different VIF_TYPE, migrating a VM from one node to the other will result in VM having no network connectivity. 
vif bindings should be updated before plug_vifs is called.
title: No network after live-migration
